data.text: Sali nai ngai, Pumi diang ningnu ningpa chongkha juiru, ajarchu hiwahi akadik kha eii. Col 3:20
“Ningnu ningpa kha khoya thoru” hiwahi chong inkhitnale inruoiya mansakhet chongpeii kha eii,
hiwahi “Nangni ringkhuo lamma akatha enasik khat-um nuoipil chungnga ringkhuo kasoot-ah ningring nasik eii.” Suok 20:12; Innidan 5:16
Pa ngai ningsa ngai raangnasik chuon kha inmani diang thomaru, khawa rathuulla nunchan katha khat-um Pumi lamma minchu inlang minlokru. Col 3:21
Suokngai nuoipil chuungnga ningkaru ngaikha Christa diang ningjuisik angnga ningmalung inthiangnga khoya ningthole inruoiya chiru.
Inmani ngai'n namu phakhan innaminriang nasik-ah chuon katha-ah nitho elekleiya, takkha Christa suok ngaikha e-inlang Pathian lungdou kha ningmalungnga wonrep inlang thoru.
Manmasi sepa emak, takkha Pumi sepa eii ti-inlang ningmalung pumpuiya thoru,
ajarchu suok um suok ka-emak um Pumi'n miring rakip diang intho chuon katha dungjuiya rawaan apesik eii tihi nangni'n ningjet. Col 3:22-25

Karu ngai nasuok ngaikha in-angrip mit-enna en-inlang minchinasik chuonkatho emaru, ajarchu nangni khat-um inmani karu kha marwaanna om tihi nangni'n ningjet, halli ama'n iteii mimeel mimai enmak. Col 4:1; Innidan 10:17; Col 3:25
Ahekna-ah, Pumi diang khat-um ama ngarna ranak khan ngirru.
Seitan chuonheitho kathamak kha ningdei matornasik Pathian raalphur puondiar rakip kha inlukru.
Ajarchu eini indeipui hi taksa khat-um thisen kha emak, takkha waikaroon, intor, hiwa akaziing manmasituol ranak khat-um lairalak ah ratha kathamak ngai khale ni-indei kha eii.
Akathamak nikhuo kha heiwa kalla ningngir matornasik-ah, khat-um angrakip ningthosuoli ningngir tit-ah ningom nasik-ah Pathian raalphur puondiar rakip kha inluktru.
Akatuun kha kongkhit minchang inlang ngirru halli akadik kha phou minchang inlang inlukru, Isa 11:5; Isa 59:17
kahoi kadai ringna chongkahoi kha rilsik-ah insuukchak kha ningkekok min-eru, Isa 52:7
apha rakip-ah ngamna kha phou min e-inlang choiru, khawa khan Kathamak Mipa meikakaang phelru kha ooksik eii.
Sanminringna lukhu kha choiru, halli Ratha chem kha-um choiru, khawa kha Pathian chong kha eii. Isa 59:17
Nisik rakip kha ang rakip-ah Ratha-ah Pathian diang niru, hiwahi ningmalungnga wonrep inlang inringchakru halli Pathian mi ngai rakip sik-ah Pathian nipicheiru.
Kei sik-um Pathian diang niru, khachu karil sik-ah kamur kamalongna rakip-ah kachi omlekleiya inphuumma kaleiom ringna chongkha karil matornasik-ah chongngai kha keidiang najuope kha erase,
ajarchu chongkahoi sik-ah kei inakadang taangwa kha ka eii, tuun mikhum na-ah kaom innum, kathosik ka-ekha kachi omlekleiya katho mator nasik Pathian diang nanipiru.
Nisuopui ka eii khat-um Pumi chuon kha huoikajouwa katho Tychicus in kei ang kalachangme emakli angme kitho tikha ningjet nasik-ah angrakip narilpijeite. Chuon 20:4; 2 Tim 4:12
Hiwa sik-ah Tychichus hi eini ang nilachangme khat-um nangni namasok nasik-ah kei'n nangni diang kiheitir kha eii. Col 4:7,8
Kahoi kadai khat-um ngamna le inruoiya minriang kha Pa Pathian khat-um Pumi Jisu Christa diangnga inphut ule nai nangni chuungnga kajuotungkha erase.
Pumi Jisu Christa kha hektik kaboiya kaminriang miring rakip diang riangwai kha kajoutung erase.
